data.text: Ɛ keli, ɛ yanban,
Ɛ a mato, dimin bata sin bɔxɔn ma
Siyane sigan tima ɛ kɛnɛnni
Ɛ yɛɛ rakoɲin ɛ rabilinni:
Ɛ na a to, ɛ sɛwan gboma ayi nɛn,
Ɲɔgɔmɛ kurune luma nɛn ɛ yamanan birin yi,
Kedari60.7 Kedari findixi Sumayilaa diin nan na. Na feen sɛbɛxi Dunuɲa Fɔlɔn 25.13 kui. bɔnsɔnna xuruse kurune birin malanma nɛn ɛ konni,
Ndee ne ra
Ige tagi bɔxɔne yigi saxi n tan nin,
Xɔɲɛne mɔn ɛ taan makantan yinna tima nɛn,
Ɛ taan so dɛɛne luma nɛn nabixi habadan,
Bayo, siyaan nun yamanan naxanye mi walɛ ɛ tan xa,
Liban yamanan binyen fama nɛn ɛ konni,
Ɛ ɲaxankata muxune diine fama nɛn,
Ɛ yi rabeɲinxi, ɛ raɲaxu,
Ɛ siyane nun e mangane nafunle donma nɛn,
N xɛmaan nafama nɛn ɛ ma sulan ɲɔxɔni,
Gbalona fe mi fa mɛma ɛ yamanani,
Sogen xa mi fa findima kɛnɛnna ra ɛ xa yanyin na,
Sogen mi fa birama ɛ konni sɔnɔn,
Nayi, tinxin muxune nan tun fa luma ɛ yamanani,
Naxan xurun ɛ tagi,
